code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CoffeeCard=_ref=>{let{proizvod,onAddToCart}=_ref;const[kolicina,setKolicina]=useState(1);const handleClick=()=>{const kolicinaInt=parseInt(kolicina);if(kolicinaInt>=1){onAddToCart(proizvod,kolicinaInt);}else{alert("Unesite validnu količinu.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"coffee-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:proizvod.slika,alt:proizvod.naziv})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:proizvod.naziv}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-description",children:proizvod.opis}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-weight",children:["Te\u017Eina: ",proizvod.gramaza]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-bottom",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cijena",children:proizvod.cijena}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:1,value:kolicina,onChange:e=>setKolicina(e.target.value),style:{width:"50px",marginRight:"10px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClick,className:"btn btn-cart",children:"Dodaj u korpu"})]})]})]});};export default CoffeeCard;
